About Me

Hi, I'm Jorne. In my dual roles as a UX Designer and Product Manager, I delve deep into the heart of problems, bridging the gap between technology, user needs, and business goals. But let's talk about you. Your challenges, your vision, and how we can collaborate to craft meaningful, impactful solutions.

In my pursuit of pragmatic solutions, I've had the privilege of shaping significant features like Bikemap's Pause Mode and unifying disparate web tools into a singular, user-friendly app. My journey at KION exemplifies my approach - where a proposed robot became a simple, cost-saving scanner, thanks to targeted user research.

My technical creativity also flourished during my Master's thesis, where I blended storytelling with augmented reality to create an immersive exploration of Frankfurt, turning the city itself into a canvas for hidden art and narratives.

I'm driven by a vision to create humane technology, aspiring to join forces with a company that not only talks the talk but walks the walk towards understanding its customers and making a tangible difference. My goal? To craft experiences that not only meet needs but also bring smiles to users' faces.

While I'm a UX and product management professional, my background in Sound and Music Production, combined with a Masterâ€™s in Leadership in the Creative Industries, has shaped my diverse skill set. From Service Design to Coding in Unity3D, my journey is one of continuous learning and application.

Away from the screen, I'm testing my limits, be it on rugby fields, lifting weights, or cycling endurance rides over 100km. These activities not only challenge me physically but also keep me grounded and connected to the real world.

Are you in search of a partner to navigate the intricacies of user experience and product management? Let's start a conversation on Linkedin or jorne@siebrands.com. I'm excited to learn about your project and explore how we can make a meaningful impact together.
